title: Pantene Pro-V Beautiful Lengths Conditioner 12.6 OZ (6 Pack)
description: Pantene Pro-V Beautiful Lengths Conditioner 12.6 OZ (6 Pack) - Experience stronger and longer hair with Pantene Pro-V Beautiful Lengths Conditioner. Pantene's extraordinary formula with unique Pro-V nutrient blends and micro-moisturizers nourishes hair to strengthen it against breakage. Enjoy a luxurious rich cream that leaves hair with long-lasting softness. Instructions: Massage into wet hair after shampooing, paying special attention to ends. Rinse thoroughly. Gentle enough for use on permed or color-treated hair.
